<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Business Aviation Newsletter: January 2015 Honeywell's Global Data Center Offers Flight Planning Support During The Big Game <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/honeywells-global-data-center-offers-flight-planning-support-during-the-big-game>
Honeywell's Global Data Center (GDC) is ready to support pilots to the greater Phoenix, AZ area during the week of the Phoenix Open and The Big Game. On February 1st, a flight support specialist from the GDC's Redmond, WA location will be on hand at Signature Flight Support...

Honeywell Gears Up Customer Support for The Big Game and Phoenix Open <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/honeywell-gears-up-customer-support-for-the-big-game-and-phoenix-open>
The extended weekend of February 1st promises to be one of the busiest corporate and general aviation fly-ins of any year for the Phoenix “Valley of the Sun” metropolitan area. Consider that nearly 600,000 people will be attending the Phoenix Open from Jan. 26th - Feb. 1st and...

We heard you! Due to customer feedback gathered from customers placing HAPP or warranty exchange orders, the MyAerospace team has implemented some infrastructure changes to improve speed and reduce errors. In some cases, when placing these zero dollar orders...

Introducing Powerful, Lightweight Satcom <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/introducing-powerful%2C-lightweight-satcom>
Aspire™ 200 <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/communication-nav-and-surveillance/satellite-communications/terminal-products-inmarsat-l-band/aspire-200> in-flight communications systems offer a broad range of connectivity options to suit a wide variety of requirements. Now, Honeywell has upgraded the entry-level Satcom to provide worldwide coverage and higher performance for small to mid-size aircraft...
